openconnector

Class Schema.Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • openconnector.Schema.Attribute
  • Enclosing class:
    Schema

    public static class Schema.Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
    The definition of a resource object attribute.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Schema.Attribute()
      Create an empty attribute.

      Create a STRING attribute with the given name.

      Create a single-valued attribute with the given name and type.

      Create a single-valued attribute with the given name, type, and size.

      Create an attribute with the given properties.

        public Schema.Attribute(java.lang.String name,
                Schema.Type type,
                java.lang.Integer size,
                boolean multi,
                java.lang.String schemaObjectType)
        Create an attribute with give properties
        Parameters:
        name - of attribute
        type - Type of attribute
        size - of attribute
        multi - boolean flag to indicate whether is multi-valued or not
        schemaObjectType - is used in case of multi-group schema

      • Schema.Attribute

        public Schema.Attribute(java.lang.String name,
                Schema.Type type,
                java.lang.Integer size,
                boolean multi,
                java.lang.String schemaObjectType,
                java.lang.String description)
        Create an attribute with given properties
        Parameters:
        name - of attribute
        type - Type of attribute
        size - of attribute
        multi - boolean flag to indicate whether is multi-valued or not
        schemaObjectType - is used in case of multi-group schema
        description - Optional long description for the attribute.

        Sets the is entitlement flag.

      • isEntitlement

        public boolean isEntitlement()
        A flag to indicate if an attribute is an entitlement. This is used to determine which attributes should be treated as additional entitlements during entitlement correlation, and should be included when prototype objects are created.

      • setEntitlement

        public void setEntitlement(boolean entitlement)
        Sets the is entitlement flag.
